"blind" by Croccifixio Constantine Caduto

With eyes closed I see the world around me
I watch as the strong take advantage of the weak
I hear the heartbreaking sound of love lost
I feel the pulse of the lost dying alone in darkness
I have travelled across the world without direction
With eyes closed I see the world black around me
I have held and comforted those falling dreams
I have cherished those brief memories touching my heart
I have cursed the strength of stone inside of me
I have weathered the worst of storms and mothers fury
With eyes closed I see the world black inside me
But each moment of love and affection is a small light
and even a candles flame can blind eyes born in darkness
each one of those moments of beauty and happiness
is a small point of light behind my blinded eyes
Those moments light up the sky like the stars
and I am blind no more.

a strange feeling has come over me 
a feeling of bitter sorrow and sweet joy
a moment of tears and smiles
an instance of hope and regret
like the feeling of a beautiful dream
when it fades away too quickly in the morning
leaving a feeling of peace and happiness
as well as an empty yearning to sleep again
I do not cry or regret any longer
it has been ages since I wept for spilled milk
or lamented for the spilling of blood
or the unleashing of sensations best buried
perhaps it is that emptiness that makes me feel
the need to find a meaning in something long dead
hope is a small flame lit suddenly in darkness
it is blinding and magnificent
that is the feeling of conflict so unfelt and dry
but like the light, my eyes adjust and it is a small matter
and I go back into the night and feed.
oh where has my love gone
in a conflict of emotions I am alone again
dreaming. dancing. 
Thinking of you.

Cut from "Bleak Seasons" by Glen Cook. It seemed poetic when i read it.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Fragments . . .

Just blackened fragments, crumbling between my fingers.

All that remains . . . A thousand hours of labor . . . Gone forever

Or are they? I do not want to go back. I do not want to relive the horror. I do not want to reclaim the pain. 

There is pain too deep to withstand right here, right now.

The mind and heart, safely over to the farther shore, simply refuse to encompass the enormity of the voyage.

And there is no time . . . 

There is a war on. Always there is a war on. Just as well to stop now. 

Teardrops make the ink run.

Fragments . . .

 . . . all around, fragments of my work, my life, my love and my pain, scattered in this bleak season . . .

And in the darkness, shards of time.

seeing nothing- by Croccifixio

Sometimes the world catches up to you
it is strange and often painful to the heart
the feeling of chaos and confusion boiling
emotionless emotion dancing on a string
mistakes and regrets over a lost lingering desire
breaking waves against a stone tasting the salt
the blood song long silent starts crying red tears
rage and anger, sorrow and regret, pain and lust
i think back to a few years ago when i lived like this
when i fought against the nature of my humanity
it is hard being a machine sometimes when the flesh dreams
i cannot think of how stupid i must look
and not compare it to how stupid that I feel
I cannot change who i am and who i have been
all those broken pieces rattling around a cage
waiting to get out, to live again, the breathe
fighting is like putting gasoline on a fire
it burns worse and worse like brilliant trash
how do you forget when you have nothing but memory
i sit here writing this filth and I close my eyes
and see nothing.

a dream. silent. running beneath the waves of sheets.
the taste of fear is in my mouth. the back of my throat.
things that i have done. been done to me. around me.
the gentle kiss of a devil in a red corset. sweet. bitter.
i struggle to awake but there is nothing outside this place
this void where once a heart beat strongly. ages ago.
a time before the sorrow. before rage and hatred. before loss.
barely a memory as i have adapted through the years. stronger.
the last kiss i remember before my life stopped meaning.
blood running down my chin. a look of pity staring me in the face.
or in the mirror. in the darkness. in love.
but it was all a dream. fictional. longing. hoping. calling.
the nightmare is the reality i was left in. abandoned.
my strength carries me though i falter at times.
silk sheets wrapped around me. caressing. satin stockings. leather
restraints. restraint. forgiveness comes from within. distant.
no matter how much pain is inflicted upon me, it will never be enough.
i will never get tired of it. my love. my loss. my heart.
though alone I am dying slowly.
always alone.
dreaming.

The time is almost here for me. 13 years of waiting. wanting.  13 years of hatred and fear. Pain. Sorrow. Loss. 13 years of hiding, pretending, taking it. its coming to an end now finally. One last dance before i close the book forever.

countless faces and images flash into my head. so fast. giavonni mclemore. G Love. he saved my ass in prison. Erynn. my first love. my first hate. my longest friend. i still can feel her heart inside of me. Chrystal. my son. death. nothing but pain. my first. junior high school. so long ago. Jimmy. lost before his time last year. Sarah. words cannot begin for her. read my journal. my reason for living. dead. last year also. Tin Man. prison rapist. retard. embodiment of evil. i should have killed him. i doubt his evil ended in prison. Bone Crusher. biggest motherfucker i have met. broke my foot. nicest gangbanger in prison. gentle giant. but he did break my foot. heheh.

Butch. my innocence. me. 15 years ago. growing up. falling down. my old brother. Walter. Kenny. Tony Frank. my brothers from so long ago. i was the worst in the end. Fred. My stepfather. Pure rage. marines do or die. Therapy? Meat Abstract. fantasy bag. McNaughton Correctional Institution. Karl. Jamie. Richard Love. Johnny Laster. my dark brother. my life was shorter than the time he had been in prison. Darkness.Melvin Hibler. half my size and the ability to make me look like a damned fool on the basketball court. every single time. "dont do it to yourself j. not again" hehe.

the swat taskforce. my heart stops. death. milwaukee county. waukesha county. washington county. Charged. Gang Kingpin federal court. maximum sentence- life. charges dropped. 5 counts of Armed Robbery with a firearm. maximum sentence possible- 100 years. my sentences...3 years, 6 years, 6 years, 7 years conccurrent, 6 years consecutive withheld sentencing probation. 5 counts possession of concealed firearm- 25 years max. charges dropped and migrated to armed robber charges. drug paraphanelia. charges dropped. fear. life plus 125 possible in time. i got lucky. they should never have let me out. 20 years ago they never would have.

i died in that place. the world ended for me. in prison time stops and the world keeps moving without you. you are displaced. you are reduced to nothing. a number. no more holidays. no more birthdays. no celebrations. nothing. just day after day in a pit with the worst monsters you can imagine. i was one of those monsters. 13 fights i had in there. i lost every single one. never fought against one person. 2 people attempted to rape me. they failed. all the good that was inside of me died there. it was replaced by ruthless madness and aggression. i became very strong. stronger than i was before. i still had my charisma when i got out. i just have a very negative outlook to the world. i have seen the worst the world has. i was the worst.

when i was freed I was scared i would be worse. but the taste of freedom. that closed those doors. i saw beauty again. i have tempered myself. with love. with friends. affection. i have lost my family but i have made my own. Brett. judy. carrie. billy. kile.neil. my one and only brother mark. others. i can never forget all the darkness though. rapists raping people in the cell next to me. listening to the crying and screaming. people being tortured. hell. no fire and brimstone. staying awake all night sharpening my toothbrush because the gangbangers were coming for us in the morning. my prison tattoo. the weightbar across the back of my head. bleeding on the floor of my cell.feeling the snap of breaking someones leg. feeling their teeth crumble under my fist. fighting for my life. fighting to not be raped. wearing magazines around my waist to prevent myself from being stabbed.

i remember 7 years ago when i put my SKS Machinegun into my mouth and pulled the trigger. i still have the .762 round that did not fire. despair. i have been alone for so long. my whole life. i have never had anyone to share my life with. all i have are these words that i write. that nobody ever reads. or nobody gets to read because i delete it all. i remember day when my son was killed. that finally broke me. of all the things in my life to harden me and to break away at my armor. all the things. when she killed my son all my shields disappeared. i was forced to look inside. to deal with it. the soldier died. and then... i started to make peace. first with erynn. then with the others that i had conflict with. because i was so dark. so twisted. so righteous. the last was marisa. i finally made my peace with her and I have found some measure of happiness in that. and in the lack of enemies in my life. i have one more person to deal with. he will not be pleased.

13 years and i now do not know where i go. my whole life i have been a prisoner.  all this time, since i was 8. for the first time in my life now, I will answer to nobody. no more reigns. no collar. no leash. nothing. "boat drinks". damn i love kile. in his own darkest hour he made me smile. 

boat drinks everyone. the dream.

its 1159pm march 22nd and I am about to die. do not miss me. the one that replaces me is much better than i ever was.

there is a dark place in the human heart

two weeks from today i get off of parole. you would think that i would be happy and all that. i am not. as i figured i am becoming much much more withdrawn from everything. my mind is not with the rest of the world really. i am just thinking. the world seems so much less for some reason. nothing that is real seems to matter to me. its been going on for a while as most people have noticed. its just that now it has gotten to the withdrawn state of things.

I decided that I would write my last song or poem by the last day of parole. i have lost my voice. the words no longer make sense to anyone but me and even then... they are sad and pathetic to my own ears. all that has been my life for these last 13 years is going to come to an end and I will not carry it with me into the future. that day will be the day that Croccifixio Constantine Caduto dies.  perhaps it is time to just be Jayme again. no more bmfd, big dad, virus, fade, jobe or whatever other identity crisis names i have used over the years. I just do not know anymore really.

this upcoming week will be harder on me mentally. or i should say harder on those around me. i can already feel changes inside of me as strange as that may seem. my desires and interests are changing. or closing. only good is coming for me, I know this. the weight will be off my shoulders. the fear will be gone. maybe the nightmares will go away. i will leave hell.

most people do not really know what life has been like for me. as long as i can remember its been one nightmare after another. we all have our own nightmares. I know. i am no stronger or weaker than the next person. but for the first time in my life it looks like i will not be in hell. i will not miss it. but what if I need it. heh. questions and questions. this is what i think like. all i have been thinking. what if. maybe. kinda. I hope so.

anyways, I will continue to write when the words are within me. I will not abandon my friends and associates here or in my life. i will just leave this all behind me. no more prison talk. no more parole talk. no more bullshit. no more pain. all of this is such a black part of my spirit. leaving it behind might actually make me less of the darkness in my life. we are our own worst source of emotion. I am too critical of myself. now i am going to let it go.

for those of you that have been here on this journey, some of you for a decade, I thank you for listening, taking the time to try to understand, and most of all, your tolerance. Croccifixio will die. Jayme will live on in his place. to fix something, it has to be broken first. i have broken far too long.

"Never question the strength of my resolve"

Jayme

28 days. 28 centuries.
a small moment. brief. insignificant.
or is that me. insignificant. microscopic.
world view? burning stone erupts.
savage. peaceful. gracefull. chaotic?
real.

I close my eyes. i try not to think.
try not to imagine. to remember.
all those things. all that time.
the dehumanization. is that a word?
the number. not the person. the...
thing?

there is a demon inside of me.
self doubt. disbelief. fear. hatred...
hunger?

my mind opens. encompasses things. everything.
i leave my body and drift. awake. dead.
i can feel the world around me.
the butterfly wings. the hurricane.
the heartbeat.  trapped in this prison.
i reach out. nobody is there. nothing.
i flex. i feel muscles move that have been...
ripped?

i feel the power of freedom. the strength.
strange dreams. strange moments in time.
how can one care for me when I care for...
not me. at least not me. sorrow. blindness.
how stupid can i be. after all that i have...
been through? been put through? put myself through?
dumb.

i cast no shadow in the darkness. no light.
i have loved. i have been loved. I have failed.
i spend my time alone. i chose this lack of vacancy.
you are too short. stick with the kiddie rides.
my mind wants to come back. to be in here...
reality?

fuck. Icon of Coil. Coil. flesh ripping.
i relax my muscles. I turn off the voice.
i put to sleep the desire. the hope. the smile.
its a sick looking thing usually. secretive.
sensual. ignorant. full of something. nothing.
love?

not today. 28 days. 28 centuries. time goes on.
and i wait here. out of time. out of patience.
nobody can push me again. nobody can control me.
nobody can have those reigns to ride me like...
a mexican donkey show?

hahah. ride me like a donkey and you will get kicked.
now i smile for real. who will i kick first?
